name: Tommy and the wizard
description:
This evening you went to sleep having completely no idea what was going to happen. But when you wake up…you find yourself in a completely different place! You are in some kind of castle… It looks like a maze, with dangerous obstacles, enemies lurking in the shadows and it seems there is no way out.  And suddenly you hear a wizard giggling and saying: “Try to escape! If you can…”

Game made by:

- xsangyhix
- Averdose
- AndreiOlinic
